channel.title: Machine Learning on Shiv Suthar
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Shiv Suthar

item.title: Project I: Adult Census Income Prediction
item.description: There are different type of people with different race, sex, country, marrital status etc having different workclass and occupation it become necessary to know in which salary class a person falls. The Goal is to predict whether a person has an income of more than 50K a year or not. This is basically a binary classification problem where a person is classified into the >50K group or <=50K group. I have created a complete blog to solve this machine learning problem.
